Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers I
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers II
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers III
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers IV
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers V
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products THC Reagent, Calibrator Kit 30, FS Calibrator 1, and DAT Performance Verifiers for semi-quantitative or qualitative determination of cannabinoids (THC) in urine using homogeneous enzyme immunoassay on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry System.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use; VITROS Chemistry Products THC Reagent is used for semi-quantitative or qualitative determination of cannabinoids (THC) in human urine using a cutoff of either 20 ng/mL or 50 ng/mL to aid in diagnosis and treatment of cannabinoid use or overdose.
